DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the long term Safety Follow-up of first patients vaccinated with AD02.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Follow-up Extension Study of AFF002 and AFF004A in Patients With Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Patients who have received AD02 during AFF002 and AFF004A will be observed.
DOC.criteria: participation in AFF002 and AFF004A no vaccination with AD02
